section.title: Architecture
section.para:
Deployment management environment using Oden consists of the following factors.
Server and Agent
Core module that executes various deployment-related works. Server is installed in build server, and Agent is installed in Target Server (server in which file will be deployed).
Oden Admin
GUI environment for deployment monitoring or execution
Use Oden to deploy target in Target Server, and search results through log. The following is an explanation of this by each section.

listitem.para: Build deployment target through CI server
Request deployment through command or Oden Admin
Sense the change of the deployment target, and return the change target to Agent
Deploy and save deployment record through Agent
Check deployment results through command or Oden Admin
